products.title: Fairhaven Carnival Roman Blind
products.metadescription: This Fairhaven Carnival roman blind is such a wonderful choice, so contemporary and fresh. It's truly the best thing to lift a scheme into the now.  The lovely watercolour floral pattern grows up the blind, fading out into the white of the fabric, keeping the vibrancy and punch.
products.productdescription: This Fairhaven Carnival roman blind is such a wonderful choice, so contemporary and fresh. It's truly the best thing to lift a scheme into the now.  The lovely watercolour floral pattern grows up the blind, fading out into the white of the fabric, keeping the vibrancy and punch.

products.title: Carnival Spice Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Carnival Spice Roman Blind in Red/Multicoloured. Made to measure from £31.68 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Carnival is a fresh vibrant range which comes in many colours to suit your needs. 
 
This vibrant pink and orange roman blind is the perfect choice to add a splash of colour and striped style to a room of your choice.
 
 Product ID: DB-AROM0824 Fabric Colour: Spice Material: 100% Cotton Headrail: White Metal Headrail     Control Type: Sidewinder Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Carnival Chartreuse Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Carnival Chartreuse Roman Blind in Yellow/Multicoloured. Made to measure from £31.68 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:

products.title: Carnival Chartreuse
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Carnival Chartreuse Deluxe Roman Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Deluxe Roman Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 350mm Max Width: 1320mm (with join 2500mm)
 	Min Drop: 400mm Max Drop: 2500mm
 	Fabric Composition: 100% Cotton
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Controls: Sidewinder control.
 	Fabric Lining: Fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available.
 	Fixings: Fixing brackets included.
 	Headrail: Robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep.
 	Finish: Fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
